text: PAED score >10-12 = Emergence delirium See approach to agitation in recovery on previous page Eye contact 4 3 2 1 0 with caregiver Purposeful 4 3 2 1 0 actions Awareness of 4 3 2 1 0 surroundings Restless 0 1 2 3 4 Inconsolable 0 1 2 3 4 Applicability to neuroatypical and neurodevelopmentally delayed children may be limited
